profile:
When you own a residential or commercial property, you determine how it looks. Details are everything when creating an atmosphere that is as aesthetically pleasing as it is welcoming to your guests. Custom fencing and decks are great ways to add a personalized touch to your surroundings. If youâ€™re looking to spruce up your space, Heartland Fence and Deck has you covered.

Serving Ottawa and the outlying areas, Heartland Fence and Deck has more than 20 years of experience in the industry. We craft custom fences and decks for homes and businesses using a variety of different materials. Our specialties include picket fencing, farm fencing, composite decks, cedar decks, patio construction, and more.

As a complement to our decks and custom fencing, we build cottages and log homes, and can assist with kitchen renovations, bathroom upgrades and basement finishing. During the winter months, we also provide residential and commercial snow removal services.

Not only does updating your fence and deck modernize your yard, it also helps to cultivate a welcoming environment for visitors. If your decks and fences are worn out and need to be replaced, our custom fencing and decks make a wonderful addition to any yard.

For more information about our custom fencing and decks, please give us a call today for an estimate. Let us build a better border for your home or business.
name: Heartland Fence And Deck
